1159390.name: Taxi Simulator
1159390.description:
I want to become a taxi driver and experience everyday life in such an interesting profession.

One might think that working behind a taxi wheel is a dull and bland task. But you couldn’t be more wrong! In Taxi Simulator you will play as a shady rap driver and drive through the wildly urban areas. Don’t worry too much about your reputation though, as it can be improved later on. You start on the lowest level in the city’s hierarchy. you are just an average cabby. Your task will be obviously to transport people.

Yet folk that you are going to meet will differ greatly. Starting with ordinary citizens, through party animals, celebrities, and mobs, and ending with prostitutes. After some time you will be king of the streets knowing every single secret and gossip. And you will be rich, like very, very rich.

Become the best taxi driver in town
The rides that you will give will make an impact on your reputation in various social groups. Scoring points with celebrities while transporting them in cozy conditions, or maybe you prefer to become a private driver for the local gang. It’s all up to you.



Become the wealthiest cabby in the city
Naturally, you take the fare for the rides you have given. You may offer your clients extra services for which they will pay more money. Or maybe you want to haggle?



It’s your call
The client has left his stuffed wallet behind. It’s up to you whether you will call it in, or keep it to yourself...



Tune your ride
You can upgrade your ride for the cash you have earned. You can Invest your money into equipment that increases passengers’ comfort or increases the car’s driving characteristics. Even both if that’s your choice.



How is your day going?
One of the taxi driver’s responsibilities is to chat with passengers. You can have a word with everyone and learn many interesting things as well as get to know how are the things in town. Unless you prefer to be silent as a grave...



If you are fed up with boring simulators and want to experience the vibrant city, then Taxi Simulator is the perfect game for you!
1159390.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 德语, 波兰语, 俄语, 意大利语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 日语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 繁体中文, 土耳其语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
